#include<iostream>
#include<map>
#include<iterator>
#include<vector>
#include<string>

int level[100005],visited[100005];

using namespace std;
int main()
{   int n,i,l=0;
    string s;
    cin>>n;
    i=0;
     map<string,int> p;
    while(n--)
    {
        cin>>s;

        if(i==0)
             {
                 p[s]=i;
                 level[++l]=i;
                 visited[i]++;
                 i++;
             }
        else
        {
        map<string,int>:: iterator itr_map=p.begin();
        if(p.find(s)==p.end())
           {
               p[s]=i;
               visited[i]++;
               i++;
           }
        else
        {
            if(visited[p[s]]==l)
              level[++l]=p[s];
            visited[p[s]]++;
        }
        }
    }
    map<string,int>:: iterator itr_map=p.begin();
    i=1;
     while(i<=l)
     {
         while(itr_map->second!=level[i])
             itr_map++;
         cout<<i<<" "<<itr_map->first<<"\n";
         i++;
         itr_map=p.begin();
     }
p.clear();
}
